latLonBoundingBox.crs: GEOGCS["WGS84(DD)", DATUM["WGS84", SPHEROID["WGS84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH]]

virtualTable.name: formule
virtualTable.sql: SELECT siig_mtd_t_formula.id_formula, siig_mtd_r_formula_elab.id_elaborazione, siig_mtd_t_formula.flg_visibile, siig_mtd_t_formula.descrizione_it, siig_mtd_t_formula.descrizione_en, siig_mtd_t_formula.descrizione_de, siig_mtd_t_formula.descrizione_fr, siig_mtd_t_formula.udm_it, siig_mtd_t_formula.udm_en, siig_mtd_t_formula.udm_de, siig_mtd_t_formula.udm_fr, siig_mtd_t_formula.ordine_visibilita, siig_mtd_t_formula.tema_low, siig_mtd_t_formula.tema_medium, siig_mtd_t_formula.tema_max, formula_soc.tema_low as tema_low_soc, formula_soc.tema_medium as tema_medium_soc, formula_soc.tema_max as tema_max_soc, formula_env.tema_low as tema_low_env, formula_env.tema_medium as tema_medium_env, formula_env.tema_max as tema_max_env, coalesce((select flg_obbligatorio+1 from siig_mtd_r_formula_criterio where id_formula=siig_mtd_t_formula.id_formula and id_criterio=1),0) as ambito_territoriale, coalesce((select flg_obbligatorio+1 from siig_mtd_r_formula_criterio where id_formula=siig_mtd_t_formula.id_formula and id_criterio=2),0) as condizioni_temporali, coalesce((select flg_obbligatorio+1 from siig_mtd_r_formula_criterio where id_formula=siig_mtd_t_formula.id_formula and id_criterio=3),0) as condizioni_meteo, coalesce((select flg_obbligatorio+1 from siig_mtd_r_formula_criterio where id_formula=siig_mtd_t_formula.id_formula and id_criterio=4),0) as bersagli_tutti, coalesce((select flg_obbligatorio+1 from siig_mtd_r_formula_criterio where id_formula=siig_mtd_t_formula.id_formula and id_criterio=5),0) as bersagli_umani, coalesce((select flg_obbligatorio+1 from siig_mtd_r_formula_criterio where id_formula=siig_mtd_t_formula.id_formula and id_criterio=6),0) as bersagli_ambientali, coalesce((select flg_obbligatorio+1 from siig_mtd_r_formula_criterio where id_formula=siig_mtd_t_formula.id_formula and id_criterio=7),0) as sostanze, coalesce((select flg_obbligatorio+1 from siig_mtd_r_formula_criterio where id_formula=siig_mtd_t_formula.id_formula and id_criterio=8),0) as incidenti, coalesce((select flg_obbligatorio+1 from siig_mtd_r_formula_criterio where id_formula=siig_mtd_t_formula.id_formula and id_criterio=9),0) as gravita, formula_soc.udm_it as udm_it_soc, formula_soc.udm_en as udm_en_soc, formula_soc.udm_de as udm_de_soc, formula_soc.udm_fr as udm_fr_soc, formula_env.udm_it as udm_it_env, formula_env.udm_en as udm_en_env, formula_env.udm_de as udm_de_env, formula_env.udm_fr as udm_fr_env FROM siig_mtd_t_formula INNER JOIN siig_mtd_r_formula_elab on siig_mtd_r_formula_elab.id_formula=siig_mtd_t_formula.id_formula LEFT OUTER JOIN siig_mtd_t_formula formula_soc on siig_mtd_t_formula.fk_formula_soc = formula_soc.id_formula LEFT OUTER JOIN siig_mtd_t_formula formula_env on siig_mtd_t_formula.fk_formula_env = formula_env.id_formula
